abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Public
            Sector Reform Project is to establish legal and
            organizational prerequisites for improved public sector
            management, improve public access to legislation, and
            strengthen regulatory framework in selected areas. This memo
            seeks approval for a four months extension of the closing
            date of the project from June 1, 2011 to October 1, 2011.
            This will be the first extension of the project. The
            extension is necessary to complete the implementation of two
            activities: development of interface for the legal database
            Adlia, and development of recommendations for streamlining
            the system of health facilities and rationalizing staffing
            levels in health service facilities.
